title: `rustdoc` is only generated if rustc is built with docs=true (in config.toml)

labels.name: T-bootstrap
labels.description: Relevant to the bootstrap subteam: Rust's build system (x.py and src/bootstrap)

body:
In the context of building the compiler (ie. `./x.py build` and `./x.py install`),
the following `config.toml` text:
```
# Flag to specify whether any documentation is built. If false, rustdoc and     
# friends will still be compiled but they will not be used to generate any
# documentation.
#docs = true
```

[That](https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/blob/d22fa2d87d03d19fdb1359faab9ec5e74eff26b3/config.toml.example#L129-L132) isn't actually true, specifically this `If docs=false, rustdoc and friends will still be compiled` isn't true, currently.

Well, in a way it's true because it generates this:
`./rust/build/x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu/stage2-tools/x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu/release/rustdoc_tool_binary` which is the renamed `rustdoc` executable, but the "real" one, which is `./rust/build/x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu/stage2/bin/rustdoc`, only gets copied(actually hardlinked) if `docs=true` (but with `docs=true` takes 15mins more to compile at the `./x.py install` stage)

<details>

`docs=false`:
```
$ find . -name rustdoc
./rust/src/doc/rustdoc
./rust/src/doc/edition-guide/src/rust-2018/rustdoc
./rust/src/test/rustdoc
./rust/src/tools/rustdoc
./rust/build/x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu/stage0/bin/rustdoc
./rust/build/bootstrap/debug/rustdoc
```

`docs=true`:
```
$ find . -name rustdoc
./rust/src/doc/rustdoc
./rust/src/doc/edition-guide/src/rust-2018/rustdoc
./rust/src/test/rustdoc
./rust/src/tools/rustdoc
./rust/build/x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu/stage0/bin/rustdoc
./rust/build/x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu/doc/rustdoc
./rust/build/x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu/doc/edition-guide/rust-2018/rustdoc
./rust/build/x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu/stage2/bin/rustdoc
./rust/build/bootstrap/debug/rustdoc
./rust/build/tmp/dist/rust-docs-1.33.0-dev-x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu/rust-docs/share/doc/rust/html/rustdoc
./rust/build/tmp/dist/rust-docs-1.33.0-dev-x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu/rust-docs/share/doc/rust/html/edition-guide/rust-2018/rustdoc
```
